ID: C1AEVNB_00
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: Geeta Manjal <Geeta.Manjal@chalhoub.com>
CC: Arlin Aranha
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-18 12:07
Subject: RE: PC Personal Shipments - Mandatory Insurance
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Geeta,

 

Please let me know what will be delivered directly to the villa and what will be delivered to the warehouse in order to intimate the insurer.

 

There is no need to additional insurance. We will consider the DIP WH as temporary storage. I just need to declare Nasco the particulars.

 

If you can provide me with the details, I will proceed accordingly.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Arlin Aranha <Arlin.Aranha@chalhoub.com>
Subject: PC Personal Shipments - Mandatory Insurance
Importance: High

 

Hi @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

Good Afternoon,

 

Hope you’re doing well.

 

As you are aware, we are currently seeking insurance for all of Mr. Patrick Chalhoub's personal cargo coming into Dubai from other countries, whether they are being delivered to DIP WHS or the location itself. 

Additionally, additional insurance is needed for shipments being delivered to the location and for goods being stored at DIP whse. 

Please let us know how we can make this process more efficient and what information we need to set things up. 

 

Regards

 

GEETA MANJAL​​​​

SENIOR COORDINATOR ‑ SHIPPING

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

Hi @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

 

I do not have the commercial documents or the values of the upcoming shipment, these will only be available once the order is ready and documents are shared with me.

For now we have 2 shipments stored in DIP whse, which will be delivered once we have the instructions to delivered to the site

 

let me know how you suggest to have the Insurance covered for Imported and stored to DIP whse + those that will be delivered to the site from DIP whse

 

regards

 

 

GEETA MANJAL​​​​
